name: Deep Sea Lost
description:
Suit up!

Time is running out for specialist rescue officer Caroline Stokes. Equipped only with her wits, courage and a rapidly depleting supply of air, she risks her life to save others. Caroline is determined to rescue a sentient AI, trapped in a fatally damaged, underwater mining and research facility, even if it means disobeying orders.

Deep Sea Lost is a single-player, 2D puzzle game for PC and Mac.

Features
  • Hand-crafted puzzles
  • Over 40 levels
  • top-tappin' synthesised sound
Controls

Arrow Keys or WSAD

Install

If you have the itch.io app, simply install the game and launch.

If you prefer you can download the zip for your operating system, extract to a folder of your choice and launch by double-clicking the executable.
